{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.17320v1", "title": "Lindblad dynamics in holography", "summary": "We develop, in the AdS/CFT correspondence, a method to compute correlation
functions when the CFT is governed by the Lindblad equation for open quantum
systems, via the AdS theory. Using a simple example in AdS$_3$/CFT$_2$, we
demonstrate that the predictions of the AdS theory based on our method match
the direct computations in the dual CFT.", "main_category": "hep-th", "categories": "hep-th,cond-mat.stat-mech,quant-ph", "published": "2025-04-24T07:22:51Z"}
